profile.name: Javier
profile.title: Frontend Developer
profile.description:
I am a Frontendüíª developer with a strong passion for design, technology, and innovation.

After several years in the world of teaching, I started a new adventure at ITAcademy where I was
learning for 9 months and I did all the necessary projects to get my Frontend Developer certification
in React.

I base myself on SOLID principles, paying attention to detail and ensuring that my code
is easy to maintain, and scalable in the future and I feel that I can create code that meets quality standardsüõ†Ô∏è.

I love working on challenging projects where I strive to improve my skills and improve myself, I like to think
that these qualities are reflected in my work since I enjoy programming
and I am excited by the immense world that Frontend development offers.

In addition, I enjoy collaborating with teams where I can learn from my colleagues and contribute my skills.
to achieve our goals and create amazing products.ü§ù

I am currently working hard to improve my skills for a Full Stack profile in different teaching platforms in a self-taught way.

React
Redux
Next.js
Angular
Node
SQL
MongoDB

Visit my portfolio in https://idilien.com/
